title: Isn’t It Okay If I’m A Neet And I’m Taken Care Of By A Cute Guild Master? - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Adventurers   Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Calm Protagonist   Carefree Protagonist   Caring Protagonist   Early Romance   Guilds   Kind Love Interests   Lazy Protagonist   Loli   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Protagonist   Neet   Overpowered Protagonist   Perverted Protagonist   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Royalty
author: Toujou Kouichi   東條功一
description:
Wilhelm is a lazy, reclusive aristocrat with superb sword and magic talents. On his father’s orders, he is sent to work for a failed adventurers’ guild, where he meets Anya, the beautiful, pure-hearted, angelic guild leader.

Anya, who has always admired Wilhelm, is kind to him and takes good care of him, and with the power of love, he easily gives up his NEET status!　In order to help Anya, he shows his talent and true value all over the place without any restraint at all! A NEET boy awakens to become the strongest adventurer!

A sweet fantasy adventure tale where you will be loved and loved to the hilt by the healthy and beautiful guildmaster!>
